sect1.title: OpenLink BPEL Process Manager Upload file
sect1.para: This page shows uploads file. This file may be bpel file for the process, wsdl file for the process, or wsdl for the partner link of the process.

simplelist.member: To choose file upload option check one of the radio boxes URL or File. If URL radio box is checked, you have to enter a valid file location. If the file expects authentication, you have to enter in the User field the user name and in the Password field the password for authentication of the file.
Click to upload a file which will be received from the entered URL or choosen from the file upload control.
Click to return back to the previous page. This will close the Upload file page.

sect3.title: File
sect3.para: When this radio box is checked, you have to choose a file from the "Browse". No relative references inside file will be accepted.

sect3.title: URL
sect3.para: When this radio box is checked, you have enter a valid file location. If the file expects authentication, you have to enter in the User and Password fields the user name and password for the authentication.
